messages:
My first car was a honda civic. _POTENTIALLY_UNSAFE__
I had a Honda Civic as my first car, too! I loved that thing.
What year was yours? Mine was a 1986. I still have it, but it needs a lot of work.
Mine was an 86 as well. It was a manual transmission, so it was a blast to drive.
That's awesome. I wish I knew how to drive a manual. I've always wanted to learn.
It's not too hard to learn, especially if you have a friend who knows how to teach you.
That's a good idea. I'll have to see if I can find someone to teach me.
I'm sure there are plenty of people in your area who would be willing to help you out.
That's good to know. Do you have any other hobbies that you like to do in your spare time?
I like to play video games, but I don't have a lot of time for that these days. How about you?
I enjoy playing video games as well. I also like to read books. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is the harry potter series by j. K. Rowling. Have you read any of her books?
No, I haven't read her books. I have heard of them though. Are they good?
Yes, they are very good. They are about wizards and witches in the wizarding world of hogwarts.
That sounds interesting. I will have to check them out. Do you have any other books you would recommend?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is the best book in the series.
That sounds like a good one to start with. Thank you for the recommendation. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is the first harry potter book by j. K. Rowling.
I haven't read that one, but I have heard good things about it. Have you read any of her other books?
Yes, I have read all of them except for the last one. I just haven't gotten around to it yet.
What is it about the book that makes you like it so much? Is it about wizards?
Yes, it's about the wizard world of hogwarts. It's very interesting.
That does sound interesting. Do you have a favorite character in the book or do you like all the characters?
I really like harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is my favorite book.
Harry potter is a great book. Have you read all the books or just the first one?
I have read all of them. My favorite character is snape. What is your favorite character?
My favorite is dudley dursley. He is such a lovable character. How about you?
Dudley is a good character. I like him too. I also like voldemort.
That's cool. I don't think I've ever met anyone who likes snape as much as I do.
I like snape too. He's a great character. What's your favorite harry potter book?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is my favorite book by j. K. Rowling.
I haven't read that one. I'll have to check it out. Do you like any other books?
I like a lot of other books. My favorite book of all time is the dark tower series by stephen king.
I've never read any of his books, but I've seen the movies. They were pretty good.
The movies are good, but the books are so much better. You should give them a try.
I think I will. I'm always looking for something new to read. What else do you like to read?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is the best book in the series.
I haven't read that one yet. I'll have to pick it up next time I'm at the library.
Do you have a favorite harry potter book? Mine is the goblet of fire.
I like that one too. I also like the one where they go to hogwarts.
Do you like any of the other books by j.k. Rowling? She is a great author.
I have not read any of her other books, but I would like to. What is your favorite book?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is my all time favorite book.
I have never read that one. I will have to check it out. I have heard good things about it.
Do you have a favorite harry potter book? I like all of them, but the deathly hallows is my favorite.
I like that one too. I also like the one where they go to hogwarts.
Oh yeah, that one was good too. Do you like any other books by j.k. Rowling?
No, I haven't read any of her other books. What is your favorite book of hers?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban. Have you ever read it?
I have not read that one, but I have seen the movie. It is one of my favorites.
Do you have a favorite harry potter book? Mine is the goblet of fire.
I like that one too. I like all of them, but the first one is my favorite.
I agree. The first book is always the best. I wish I could go back in time and read it for the first time again.
That would be awesome. I would love to be able to go back and read the first book again. It's been so long since I've read it.
It has been a long time for me as well. I think it is time for a re-read.
I think you're right. I'll have to see if I can find the books at the library.
If you can't find them, you can always buy them on amazon. That is what I do.
That's a good idea. I don't know why I didn't think of that. Thanks!
You are very welcome. I hope you can find them and enjoy them as much as I do!
I'm sure I will. Have you read any of the harry potter books? I've only seen the movies.
I have read all of them except for the last one. I haven't gotten around to it yet.
Do you have any other books you'd recommend? I'm always looking for something new to read.
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is one of my favorites.
I'll have to check that one out. I've heard a lot of good things about it.
I think you would like it. It's about voldemort and the death eaters.
That sounds like it would be a good read. I'll check it out next time I'm at the library.
I hope you like it as much as I do. What is your favorite harry potter book?
I don't have a favorite book, but my favorite character is harry. Do you like harry?
I love harry! I think he is the best character in the series. I also love goblet of fire.
My favorite book is the prisoner of azkaban. Have you read that one?
No, I haven't. Is that the one where harry goes to hogwarts?
Yes, that's the one. It's one of my favorites. What's your favorite book?
Harry potter is my favorite book of all time. I've read it so many times that I can recite it from memory.
Do you have a favorite character in harry potter? I like harry and his friends.
My favorite character is hufflepuff. Do you like any of the characters in the books?
I don't think I've ever read the books. I'm more of a movie person. Which book is your favorite?
My favorite book is the prisoner of azkaban. Have you ever read it?
No, I haven't read that one. I'll have to check it out. What is it about?
It's about a prisoner who escapes from prison. It's a really good book.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I might have to read it after I finish the harry potter series.
It's really good. Do you have any other books you'd recommend? I'm always looking for new ones to read.
I don't have a lot of time to read these days, but I really enjoyed the hunger games series.
I've heard good things about that series, but never got around to reading it. Maybe I'll give it a try.
I think you would really enjoy it. I know you like dystopian novels, so it would be right up your alley.
I'll have to check it out next time I'm at the bookstore. Thanks for the recommendation!
You are very welcome. I hope you enjoy it as much as I did. Have a great day!
I'm sure I will! You have a good day as well, thanks for chatting with me!
Of course! I love talking to people about books. It's one of my favorite things to do.
Do you have a favorite harry potter book? Mine is the goblet of fire.
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is my favorite. What is your favorite book?
That's a good one too. My favorite book is the hunger games. Have you read it?
No, I haven't read that one. I will have to check it out. Do you like any other books?
I like a lot of books. I like to read a lot. What's your favorite genre?
I like sci-fi and fantasy. I also like mystery and thrillers.
Do you have a favorite mystery or thriller book? I'm always looking for something new to read.
Harry potter is my favorite book. It is a mystery thriller. What about you?
My favorite book is the goblet of fire. What is your favorite harry potter book?
I like that one too. My favorite is the order of the phoenix. Have you read it?
No, I haven't read that one. I will have to check it out. Do you like any other books?
I like a lot of books, but I don't have time to read as much as I used to.
I know what you mean. It's hard to find the time when you have so many other things to do.
I know. I wish I had more time to spend with my family. How is your family doing?
My family is doing well, thank you for asking. I'm glad you have your family to spend time with.
I am glad to hear that. Yes, my family is very important to me. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban. How about you?
Harry potter is a great book. My favorite is the hunger games. Have you read it?
No, I haven't read it, but I have seen the movie. It was pretty good.
Do you have any other books you would recommend? I'm always looking for new books to read.
I don't have a lot of time to read, but when I do I like to read books by stephen king.
I've never read any of stephen kings books. I'll have to check them out.
Do you like harry potter? That's my favorite book of his. I also like the dark tower series.
I've seen the movies, but never read the books. Maybe I'll give them a try.
You should, they are really good. I think you would like them. What is your favorite book?
Harry potter and the prisoner of azkaban is one of my favorites.
I haven't read that one yet, but it is on my list. I really like the goblet of fire.
That's a good one too. It's hard to pick a favorite when they're all so good.
Do you have a favorite harry potter book? I love all of them, but deathly hallows is my favorite.
